casebody.data:
VROOMAN, Appellant, v. HOUSTON, W. S. & P. F. R. CO., Respondent. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. March 6, 1894.) Appeal from city court, general term. Action by Lyman C. Yrooman against the Houston, West Street & Pavonia Ferry Railroad Company.

Argued before DALY, C. J., and BISCHOFF and PRYOR, JJ.

Lamb, Osborne & Petty, for appellant. Coudert Bros., for respondent.

No opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs. See 27 N. Y. Supp. 257.
